homeIncognito.welcomeTitle: Welcome to RESTify — Simplify Your API Workflow
homeIncognito.welcomeText: RESTify is your go-to tool for testing and debugging RESTful APIs. Light, fast, and intuitive, it's designed to help developers streamline their API development process without the clutter of bulky tools like Postman or Thunder.
homeIncognito.themeAchievement: Change the theme from light to dark and vice versa
homeIncognito.languageAchievement: You can change the language in the top right corner
homeIncognito.restAchievement: Go to RESTfull client, check your API and get responses to requests
homeIncognito.historyAchievement: Go to History, see previous requests and responses

notFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFound.text: Oops! The page you are looking for does not exist.
